trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for a custom type converter.
trans-unit.target: 為自訂型別轉換子提供抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> class enables you to implement serialization and deserialization processes for managed types that are not natively supported by the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>類別可讓您實作序列化和還原序列化程序的原生不支援的 managed 型別<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> when you need more control over the serialization and deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>時需要更多控制序列化和還原序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A> property indicates the types for which a custom converter provides converter services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A>屬性會指出自訂轉換子提供轉換子服務的型別。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that a custom converter must be used by the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance, you must register the converter with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出自訂轉換子必須能使用由<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>執行個體，您必須註冊轉換器與執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class directly, you should use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A> method to register the converter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>直接類別中，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A>註冊轉換器方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if you are invoking Web methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript) and you want to use the custom converter, you can register it by adding a `converters` element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果您叫用 Web 方法，從 ECMAScript (JavaScript)，而且您想要使用自訂轉換子，您可以註冊它藉由新增`converters`組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance is serializing a type for which it has a custom converter registered, the serializer calls the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>執行個體已序列化的類型，它有已註冊，自訂轉換子的序列化程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance is deserializing a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string and recognizes that a type inside the JSON string has a custom converter associated with it, the serializer calls the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>執行個體還原序列化的 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 字串，並且辨識在 JSON 字串型別具有相關聯的序列化程式呼叫它的自訂轉換器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Deserialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom converter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立自訂轉換子<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" />, you must override the following members:
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" />，您必須覆寫下列成員：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> provides the <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" /> method that will be used by implementers of <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 提供<see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" />方法的實作器會使用<see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" />。

trans-unit.source: Converter code must be able to take a value that is contained in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value into an object of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換子程式碼必須能夠進行序列化程式會將傳遞給它，在字典中包含的值，然後將該值轉換為型別的物件<paramref name="T" />。

trans-unit.source: Rather than re-implementing the custom conversion code to accomplish this, you can call the <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 而不需重新實作的自訂轉換程式碼完成這項作業，您可以呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> instance of property data stored as name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 以名稱/值組方式儲存的屬性資料之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type of the resulting object.
trans-unit.target: 產生的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, converts the provided dictionary into an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將提供的字典轉換成屬於指定型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 已還原序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Deserialize(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Type,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)" /> method iterates through the values in the <paramref name="dictionary" /> parameter to construct an instance of the type requested in the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Deserialize(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Type,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)" />方法中的值會逐一<paramref name="dictionary" />來建構執行個體在要求的型別參數<paramref name="type" />參數。

trans-unit.source: Although a converter can directly use values from <paramref name="dictionary" />, we recommend that the converter implementer use the <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 雖然轉換子可以直接使用的值<paramref name="dictionary" />，我們建議使用轉換器實作器<see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" />方法改為。

trans-unit.source: The converter should call this method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> instance available from the <paramref name="serializer" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 轉換器應該呼叫這個方法的<see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" />可從執行個體<paramref name="serializer" />參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" /> method enables converter to pass a property value from <paramref name="dictionary" />, and then return a value of the expected type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" />方法可讓轉換器，將屬性值，從<paramref name="dictionary" />，然後傳回預期類型的值。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, a converter for a custom type might be working with properties that themselves have registered converters (for example, type A has a property of type B, and type B is also associated with a custom converter).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，自訂類型轉換器可能會使用屬性本身有已註冊轉換器 （例如，輸入具有類型 B 」 的屬性和類型 B 也是自訂的轉換子相關聯）。

trans-unit.source: In that case, invoking <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" /> makes sure that custom converters will be recursively invoked for property data that is contained in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，叫用<see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType``1(System.Object)" />可確保自訂轉換子，將會以遞迴方式包含在字典中的屬性資料的叫用。

trans-unit.source: When the converter has iterated through all entries in the dictionary, it returns a constructed instance of the target type.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換有逐一查看字典中的所有項目時，它會傳回建構的執行個體的目標類型。

trans-unit.source: If the converter encounters a problem during deserialization, it should throw an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> error that describes the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換器還原序列化期間遇到問題，則應該擲回<see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />描述問題的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object that is responsible for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 負責序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, builds a dictionary of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建置由名稱/值組所組成的字典。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent the object’s data.
trans-unit.target: 包含代表物件資料之索引鍵/值組的物件。

trans-unit.source: When you serialize a type for which a custom converter is registered, the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance invokes the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您序列化為其註冊自訂轉換子，型別<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>執行個體叫用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize(System.Object,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)" /> must be an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> instance with zero or more name/value pairs that represent an object’s data to be converted to JSON.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<see cref="M:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize(System.Object,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)" />必須<see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />具有零或多個名稱/值組表示要轉換成 JSON 物件的資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The converter itself does not serialize data as JSON.
trans-unit.target: 轉換器本身不會將資料序列化為 JSON。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the converter builds a dictionary of name/value pairs that contain the property names (the string key for the dictionary) and corresponding property values (the object value in the dictionary).
trans-unit.target: 相反地，轉換器會建置包含的屬性名稱 （字典的字串索引鍵） 和對應屬性的名稱/值組的字典值 （在字典中的物件值）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> instance subsequently converts these to JSON.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" />後續執行個體轉換為 JSON。

trans-unit.source: If the converter encounters an exception, it should throw an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> error that describes the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換器遇到例外狀況，則應該擲回<see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />描述問題的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of the supported types.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得所支援型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that represents the types supported by the converter.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的物件，表示轉換子支援的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A> property lists the types that are supported by the converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A>屬性列出轉換器所支援的型別。

trans-unit.source: At run time, a <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance uses this property to determine the mapping of managed types to their corresponding custom converters.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>執行個體會使用這個屬性，以判斷其對應的自訂轉換器的 managed 類型的對應。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A> property in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes%2A>衍生類別中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the converter supports only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> type.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，這個轉換子只能支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>型別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>類別。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes" /> must always return a collection, and the collection must contain at least one entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes" /> 一律會傳回一個集合，集合和集合必須包含至少一個項目。
